item.title: Learning Notes
item.description: Update statefulset forbidden filed Error message: spec: Forbidden: updates to statefulset spec for fields other than 'replicas', 'template', and 'updateStrategy' are forbidden" Solution: kubectl delete statefulset –namespace <name_space> <statefulset_name> –cascade=false update statefulset delete old pods --cascade=true: If true, cascade the deletion of the resources managed by this resource (e.g. Pods created by a ReplicationController). Default true.
